item.title: President Biden: Fund Utilities, Defund Police
item.description: Photo by Gustavo Fring from Pexels This week Joe Biden’s White House announced that the President would encourage mayors and governors - or “cities and states” - around the country to use unspent American RPA dollars to fund police. Not rent relief Not utility debt relief. Not supplement food assistanc. Not even public transit to relieve gas price pressures. More police. And they did it while hinting that it’s to provide enough cops to tamp down protest in the summer of 2022, relying on falsified reports about made-up “crime wave” stories.
